title: Ilija Tučević
text:
Ilija Tučević (born 18 October 1995) is a <a href="Montenegro">Montenegrin</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
Tučević started his career at hometown club <a href="OFK%20Grbalj">Grbalj</a> and joined <a href="FK%20Budu%C4%87nost%20Podgorica">Budućnost Podgorica</a> in summer 2017.
On 13 August 2019 he signed with Russian club <a href="FC%20Armavir">FC Armavir</a>.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Armavir">FC Armavir</a> on 7 September 2019 in a game against <a href="FC%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Nizhny Novgorod</a>, he substituted <a href="Denis%20Kutin">Denis Kutin</a> in the 64th minute.
